name: Coach Bus Driver Academy 3D
description:
Bus simulator- Mountain bus driving 3D
Start off-road lessons to become bus driver in town. A beautiful valley in middle of mountains. Bus driver academy teaches you real bus skills. Once you master skills in bus driving simulator, go out in beautiful valleys as you will no more be worried about bus parking there.

If you want to become real bus driver, then you play offroad bus simulator game. Learn real bus parking. Best controls with real life scenarios. Avoid traffic collision, obey traffic rules, watch traffic signs, speed limits, and be careful at zebra crossing at hill stations. One of coach bus driving games for those who wants to go driving school. Fan of driving schools can play this bus simulator. Play levels to get a grasp of coach bus driving rules at downtown. Driving grand vehicles in varying weather conditions. One of coolest bus driving simulator on store.

Bus Driving Simulator- Offroad driving locations
Accelerate, brake, and steer carefully road. They can be dry or wet depending on weather. Wet roads are slippery. Avoid speed driving. Use headlight at night. Go uphill or downhill on highroads. Keep an eye on the navigation, mini map to find your destination at bus parking stations. Learn everything you need for public transport at this particular driving academy. At the end, you will be able to take tourists to off-road locations.

Enter mountain bus simulator world, enjoy bus driving simulator experience! Ultimate real bus driver place.
